description: Monitors Kubernetes cluster using Prometheus. Shows overall cluster CPU / Memory / Filesystem usage as well as individual pod, containers, systemd services statistics. Uses cAdvisor metrics only.

panels.title: Container Restarts Increment in 1 hour for $Pod

reduceOptions.fields: /^kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{app_kubernetes_io_instance="tesla-ops-monitoring", cluster="ops-prometheus", container="elasticsearch", instance="10.8.11.12:8080", job="kubernetes-service-endpoints", k8s_app="kube-state-metrics", kubernetes_name="kube-state-metrics", kubernetes_namespace="monitoring", namespace="logging", pod="logging-es-data-01-0"}$/

/^kube_pod_container_status_running{app_kubernetes_io_instance="tesla-ops-monitoring", cluster="ops-prometheus", container="elasticsearch", instance="10.8.11.12:8080", job="kubernetes-service-endpoints", k8s_app="kube-state-metrics", kubernetes_name="kube-state-metrics", kubernetes_namespace="monitoring", namespace="logging", pod="logging-es-data-01-0"}$/

title: Kubernetes Pod Metrics
